txt.en: Zîrar Tarka, the Shield Isles, serve as Umbar's bulwark against the storms that often trouble the Great Sea, but so too do they often prove the doom of unwary sailors, as countless ships have run aground on its coasts—their wrecks caught in the grinding jaws of the Shedax Khîn.
You have completed many quests in Zîrar Tarka, the Shield Isles of Umbar.
You have defeated many foes in Zîrar Tarka, the Shield Isles of Umbar.
Complete Explorer of the Shield Isles
Complete Quests of the Shield Isles
Complete Slayer of the Shield Isles
You have thoroughly explored Zîrar Tarka, the Shield Isles of Umbar.

Zîrar Tarka, the Shield Isles, serve as Umbar's bulwark against the storms that often trouble the Great Sea, but so too do they often prove the doom of unwary sailors, as countless ships have run aground on its coasts—their wrecks caught in the grinding jaws of the Shedax Khîn.
